channel.title: Market Performance on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Market Performance on FinanClub

item.title: U
item.description: score:212 Chances: Unity Software Inc. (U) closed the most recent trading day at $37.05, moving +0.32% from the previous trading session. Shares of game engine maker Unity fell 5.5% in the morning session after Piper Sandler analyst Brent Bracelin downgraded the stock’s rating from Neutral (Hold) to Underweight (Sell).

item.title: PSTG
item.description: score:260 Chances: Pure Storage Inc. (PSTG) will replace Patterson Companies Inc. (NASD:PDCO) in the S&P MidCap 400, and Patterson Companies will replace Chico’s FAS Inc. (NYSE:CHS) in the S&P SmallCap 600 effective prior to the opening of trading on Friday, January 5. Pure Storage’s all-flash storage platform being leveraged by Toss Bank in South Korea for reliable digital financial services.

item.title: IMGN
item.description: score:69 Chances: ImmunoGen has shown strong performance compared to its sector so far this year.The acquisition of ImmunoGen fills an immediate need and provides additional benefits.ImmunoGen is an innovative biotech company working on important research and developments in the medical world.The projected fair value for ImmunoGen is promising based on Free Cash Flow to Equity.
